The extrusion depth towards the normal is 0.0643 and there is no extrusion in the opposite direction of the normals. The resulting CAD model is a cylindrical object with a flat top and a pointed bottom, with dimensions of 0.75 units in length, 0.064 units in width, and 0.75 units in height. The object is not connected to any other object, and is stationary and not in motion. The top and bottom surfaces are parallel to each other and the object is symmetrical along its central axis.</description>
